reviewText: This video was very informative and explicite in detailing intimate and erotic shaving. My wife and I found it to be not only educational but also very exciting.

The DVD has much to offer with regards to nudity and lovemaking scenes.  However, if you are looking to learn exactly "how-to-shave" the pubic area, keep looking.  There is very little "training" on the fine art of how to shave in this DVD.
Very well presented.  Very erotic and arousing!  Informative. Educational.  A Must have if you're looking to spice up your relationship!  This video is as part of a series.  Now I want them all!
